SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
A train station? This city looks
straight out of ye olden times.
Have we somehow landed ourselves
somewhere on the old continent?

SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Is anyone still runnin' steam
locomotives in this day and age?

SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
This is all so odd; what exactly are we
supposed to DO here? At least we had a
clear objective while chasing that man.

SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text: Guess this here's our only clue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Beggin' your pardon, feller, but you
ever seen a triangle like this before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_01.text:
But that's... Where could you two
possibly have found such a thing!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.text:
I'll ask the questions here, pardner.
Clearly you know this little number,
so I'd sure appreciate it if you could
tell me everything you know about it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.text:
If knowledge is what you seek, use these
tickets to arrive at the answer yourselves.
...If you're capable of such, that is.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.text: Now hold on just a dang minute!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Could that man have been an accomplice
of the other? They both have a garish
appearance, as well as a somewhat
roundabout way of talking.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Let's use these tickets and see where
they lead. Long as we're on this ride,
I'm gonna see it through to its end.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I ain't never ridden on a
horse-drawn carriage before!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
That streetcar was like
something out of a museum.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
This a radio tower? Boy howdy, I sure
appreciated these back in the war.
Even when broadcasts were in another
language, it still beat silence.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, loves! I'm the songstress!
Thank ye for all your support!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Er, I'm afraid neither of us are
familiar with your work—but we'd
love to hear you sing all the same!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, but that's proper kind of ye.
In fact, it gives me the courage
I need to join ye on your journey!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Ain't nobody invited you on a ride-along!
This ain't a pleasure trip, it's business—and
besides, don't you got songstressin' to do?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Aye, I do—and like I said, ye gave me the
courage to toss all my fetters away and
leap headfirst into a grand new world!
'Tis my destiny, so it is!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text:
Okay, this is getting weird.
Look, it was nice meeting you
and all, but we need to go.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_00.text: You cannae get away from me, loves!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text:
You there! Listen to my ballad!
Congratulations. You are very welcome.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text:
Okay, now we got us some robots?
The level of technology in this place
makes no dang sense.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text:
Do hurry and request a ballad, now.
The customer is king!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text: I'm ignoring you, la la la!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text:
I will not leave your side until you
make your request. Good day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_010_CUT_00.text:
I've a fine old tune that will surely
pluck at your heartstrings!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
And now we got some weirdo taggin' along!
What'n the heck should we do?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
A weirdo AND some cats. I guess we're just
that likeable? Or maybe it's destiny.
Regardless, I think we have to let them
join our merry little band.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
You sure do roll with the punches, hon.
Heck, I was trained to adapt to changin'
conditions, but what about you? How
does this not get you flippin' your lid?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
Maybe I'm just more flexible now because of
everything I went through with my parents.
But in the end, you just have to accept
things as they are and move on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
Well if you ever feel a need to start
hootin' and hollerin' at the top of
your lungs, you go ahead and do it—
because I'm sure as heck gonna!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_000_CUT_01.text:
Good plan, Bonnie. When it all gets
to be too much, we'll scream together.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It's a mite early in the day for drinkin',
which is a real shame; this looks like the
sorta place where a girl could have
herself some real fun.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We've a fine variety of fizzy drinks
if you would prefer, ladies.
Please do help yourselves.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oi! I 'eard a rumour what blokes could drink
for free at this 'ere pub— gimme a shot of
the good stuff and keep it comin', bird!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I believe you've entered the
wrong establishment, sir.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Think so, do ya? Well, you got bottles
and I got a thirst, so what bloody
difference does it make?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately for you, sir, we've
a new pair of bouncers on the job.
...Ahem. ...AHEM.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Shoot, now I'm so thirsty,
I don't care what time it is!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Please accept these tickets,
my brave lasses.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_010_020.text:
This is no time for drinking our cares
away, Bonnie. We need to get moving.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Hm. It appears I chose the wrong
patrons to appoint as our bouncers.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Now then, anyone who finds themselves
in the wrong place, please do leave.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Museum of Albion, ladies.
To celebrate our bicentennial anniversary, we are
presenting commemorative gifts to our visitors.
I do hope you will accept one.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you tell us if you've ever
seen a triangle like this before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Beneath the streets of Avalon lie not only
lost treasures, but unimaginably terrifying
creatures just waiting to awaken from their
eternal slumber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But that has absolutely nothing to
do with your triangle. Oh my, no.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi! Yer some'a them lostlings, ain'tcha? Well,
we'll be needin' your 'elp with an investigation,
so I'm gonna go ahead and nick one'a them lovely
little items ya gathered. There's a lass!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text: Lovely little items? Like this one?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, so you're in league with 'them,' 
are ya? Quite the discovery, innit...

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Who exactly are you referring to?
Also, what even IS this triangle?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
I've nothin' to say to 'them'
OR their cronies! Now sod off!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Greetings, Madams, and welcome to Deeps. 
What can I help you with today? Footwear?
A bag? A fine hat? Or perhaps we could
tailor a new suit especially for you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Or perchance you ladies seek
something else entirely?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this companion triangle will
more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, madams!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
We greatly look forward
to serving you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
So is this a shoppin' mall?
Sure got a different vibe than
the ones back in Capitol City.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: Oh dear, just look at those slovenly women come here to shop. Some sort of foreigners, perhaps? Poor fools must not be aware this store deals only in goods of quality.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
I made a full loop of the shop
and didn't see anything that
seemed related to our triangle.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Visitors, is it? Then permit me to educate you!
This boutique, you see, deals exclusively in
the finer things. As such, it does not stock
random items such as 'triangles.' Well, except perchance in the
children's toys department.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: Guess we ain't checked there yet.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text: Thank you for your help, ma'am.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh! How lovely that you've managed
to learn your basic courtesies!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I found the thing, but turns out it
actually IS part of a children's puzzle!
Think you can solve this, Bonnie?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
You think I fell off the wagon
yesterday? 'Course I can solve
a goshdarn kiddie puzzle!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BORO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
It's just a children's puzzle, Bonnie.
Don't get discouraged.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh dear, I never would have expected to encounter
a lostling in a place like this! Clearly I need to broaden
my horizons—which is why I will join you on your
journey through the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
We picked up ANOTHER weirdo!
What in the heck do we do now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Maybe they're connected
to the triangle people?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
If you wish to murmur without my overhearing,
might I suggest you sidle further away?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Know then that I am Guinevere, rightful queen
of Albion by marriage. Alas, certain incidents
have transpired that have relegated me to the
management of lostlings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, that's impressive. Question, then:
have you seen a triangle like this before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
That is a triangle of power. It is said
they grant various powers to those who
possess them, but I do not believe this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough with the dang riddles, darlin'!
Does the thing have power or not!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Do you truly believe one can achieve supremacy simply by possessing a triangle? That the acquisition of power is as simple as gathering up various bits and bobs? No, my lostlings. If there is power within you, it comes from you, not your possessions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: And with that, let us begin our journey!

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, that's Sorries for you, isn't it?
They've even got lostlings in stock!
That said, I certainly can't complain
about the timing. Right then. You lostlings make way,
because I'm coming along.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perfectly reasonable to be wary,
but you've nothing to worry about. My name is Lancelot, and I'm a Knight of the
Round Table. Sadly, there's a bit of a shambles
at the moment, and I've a need to be somewhere
other than Avalon—so cheers and all that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Whatever you say there, feller.
But say, you seen this shape before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
All that triangle will bring is foul luck.
You'd be wise to bin it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
We're trying to solve a mystery here,
and this triangle is our single clue.
We're not about to 'bin it' just because
you think it might be unlucky.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, travellers in the midst of a noble quest.
Then of course, you cannot free yourself of the
triangle no matter the ill fortune it brings! Well then, as a knight, I've no choice but to
accompany you on this journey, so that I may
bear at least a portion of your burden.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.text:
We rode all around the city and burned
through a heap'a tickets, but didn't
learn a darn thing about that triangle.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.text:
True. It's clearly special in some way,
but actual facts are proving elusive.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.text:
As to be expected. However, as you have
proven yourselves able to command the
power hidden within that piece, I feel
comfortable entrusting you with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.text:
We are Quisstatium, they who build the
roads! Complete that, and we will recognize
you as kindred souls and tell you all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.text:
The man who dropped this piece said our
president betrayed him—and tried to kill
him because of it. Is that the sort of
organization you belong to?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.text:
While every organization contains members
who step over the line, I assure you we are
not any manner of criminal syndicate. That said, the further details you seek
must wait until you've filled in all of
the pieces in that frame.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.text:
First tickets, now pieces? Good thing
I love me a puzzle. Now what'd you say
your little group was called again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_070.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_070.text: Quisstatium. They who build the roads.

SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W09_EVAR_BOFO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_080.text:
Boy howdy, that there's a real mouthful.
But don't worry, feller! We'll fill this
thing chock-full'a pieces, and then you
can tell us all about Kissy Stadium!
